    • Field Detail

      • name

        public java.lang.String name
        Name will be used as ID. Never be common between any two people.

      • att

        public int att
        Attractiveness.

      • iLevel

        public int iLevel
        Intelligence Level.

      • Budget

        public int Budget
        Budget for buying gifts.

      • cmtd

        public boolean cmtd
        Boolean variable for person's current status: Committed or Not. True if Committed else False.

      • type

        public java.lang.String type
        Type when committed. A girl can be either of: The Choosy, The Normal, The Desperate. A Boy can be either of: The Miser, The Generous, The Geeks.

      • gbasket

        public giftBasketInh gbasket
        Gift Basket. Boy gives a Gift Basket to girl when committed, Girl receives a Gift Basket when committed.
